onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.LoginActivity
Receives result returned from FragmentActivity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), checking Google Sign In result if appropriate.
onBindViewHolder(PassphraseAdapter.Holder, int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.view.PassphraseAdapter
Binds the specified PassphraseAdapter.Holder to the Passphrase at the specified position in this adapter instance.
onClick(View, int, Passphrase) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.MainActivity
Handles click on item in list by opening PassphraseFragment edit dialog.
onClick(View, int, Passphrase) - Method in interface edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.view.PassphraseAdapter.OnClickListener
Handles a click on a specified View in the RecyclerView, corresponding to the Passphrase at index position in the PassphraseAdapter.
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.LoginActivity
Attempts to refresh most recently logged-in account, switching to MainActivity if successful, and displaying Google Sign In button otherwise.
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.MainActivity
Initializes UI, sets up observers for backing ViewModel data, and sets up an observer for active GoogleSignInAccount.
onCreate() - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.DicewareApplication
Initializes the app by passing this instance (as the context) to GoogleSignInService.
onCreateDialog(Bundle) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.PassphraseFragment
Constructs and returns an AlertDialog containing edit controls for the properties (key and word list) of a passphrase.
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.MainActivity
Inflates options (action bar and overflow) menu resource, attaching the inflated items to the specified Menu.
onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup, int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.view.PassphraseAdapter
Creates and returns a PassphraseAdapter.Holder that can be bound to any Passphrase in this instance's list of items.
onLongPress(Menu, int, Passphrase) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.MainActivity
Handles context (long) press on item in list by inflating a context menu.
onLongPress(Menu, int, Passphrase) - Method in interface edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.view.PassphraseAdapter.OnContextListener
Handles a long press on a specified position in the PassphraseAdapter.
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.controller.MainActivity
Handles selections from the options (action bar and overflow) menu.
